markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knockback](/Feats.aspx?ID=160) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful Strike.

</column>

---

The weight of your swing drives your enemy back. You push the foe back 5 feet, with the effects of a successful Shove. You can follow the foe as normal for a successful Shove.

<title level="2">Knockback leads to...</title>
[Awesome Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=167)
name: Knockback
requirement: Your last action was a successful Strike.
requirement_markdown: Your last action was a successful Strike.
